definitions.definition: An n - dimensional generalization of a plane ; an affine subspace of dimension n − 1 that splits an n -dimensional space. (In a one-dimensional space, it is a point ; in two-dimensional space it is a line ; in three-dimensional space, it is an ordinary plane.)

main_definition: ( geometry ) An n - dimensional generalization of a plane ; an affine subspace of dimension n − 1 that splits an n -dimensional space. (In a one-dimensional space, it is a point ; in two-dimensional space it is a line ; in three-dimensional space, it is an ordinary plane.)
